query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(plantdate) AS month, COUNT(*) AS tree_count, qcaretaker, qspecies WHERE plantdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, qcaretaker, qspecies ORDER BY month, qcaretaker, qspecies

month.description: Month and year when tree planting occurred

qcaretaker.description: Agency or person that is primary caregiver to tree

table_metadata.title: Street Tree List
table_metadata.description: List of dpw maintained street trees including: Planting date, species, and location
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: City planners, environmental researchers, urban developers
